mapper.select: select * from user where user.`email`= #{email} limit 1
select r.* from pms.user u inner join pms.role r on u.rid = r.rid where u.uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: insert into purchaser (uid, uname, email, pwd) values (#{uid}, #{uname}, #{email}, #{pwd})
insert into vendor (uid, uname, email, pwd, phone, address) values (#{uid}, #{uname}, #{email}, #{pwd}, #{phone}, #{address})
